short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically hide those annoying Facebook Stories.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For those who are tired of seeing Stories every time you go to Facebook, this extension quickly hides it. If you want to see the Stories module again, simply uninstall the extension.
